Class AlertUtil

java.lang.Object
com.exammanager.util.AlertUtil
public abstract class AlertUtil extends Object
A utility class for displaying various alerts.

Contains methods for displaying:

  • Database connection errors
  • Generic errors with custom messages
  • Alerts asking for confirmation (e.g. before deletion)
  • Information about the application
  • Information dialogs

  • Method Details

    • showDatabaseConnectionError

      public static void showDatabaseConnectionError(String message)
      Method for displaying a database connection error.

      Parameters:
      message - the message to display in the error

    • genericError

      public static void genericError(String header, String message)
      Method for displaying a generic error alert.

      Parameters:
      header - the alert's header text
      message - the alert's main content

    • confirmationAlert

      public static boolean confirmationAlert(String title, String header, String content)
      Method for displaying an alert asking the user for confirmation.

      Parameters:
      title - the alert's title
      header - the alert's header text
      content - the alert's main content
      Returns:
      returns true if 'OK' is clicked, false if 'Cancel' is clicked

    • showAppInformation

      public static void showAppInformation()
      Method for displaying an information alert containing information about the application. Called when 'About' is clicked under the 'Help' menu of the menu bar.

    • showInformation

      public static void showInformation(String title, String content)
      Method for displaying an information dialog.

      Parameters:
      title - the dialog's title
      content - the dialog's main content text
